# Delete an attachment

Learn how to delete an attachment from a custom account, subscription, invoice, credit memo, or debit memo object.

1.  Open the detail page of the target object, scroll down to the Attachments section.
2.  Find the target attachment you want to delete by the title.
3.  Click the action menu bar and click Delete.

    Figure 1.

    ![The action menu of an attachment.](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/fab71fec-635a-4764-a34e-69ba0df6628f?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..J3nyFyZe93dCwN_GGJuTNddQnUnpoWkTZq8pYvuhHPE)

4.  Click OK to confirm the deletion.
